main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.uiexamples.htsmlm.autopilot.image

Class DoubleArrayImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.uiexamples.htsmlm.autopilot.image.DoubleArrayImage

  • public class DoubleArrayImage
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic 2D image backed by a single double[] java array.
    Author:
    royer

        Returns:
        true if success, false if failed.
